description: Building next generation applications with .NET, .NET MAUI and Microsoft Azure, to help our customers to succeed.

Leading a team of multiple software developers. Increased the usage of S.O.L.I.D., clean code principles, continuous integration & delivery, static code analysis, automatic code formatting and mentoring of junior colleagues.

Built Frontend Web Applications with Aurelia, Angular 5+ and NodeJS.

Built RESTful Services with .NET Classic, .NET Core and Entity Framework (Core).

Heavy use of Microsoft Azure Architecture and Products.

Introduced Unit Tests in all new projects with a minimum Code Coverage of 90%.

Introduced S.O.L.I.D., clean code principles, continuous integration & delivery, static code analysis, automatic code formatting and mentoring of junior colleagues.

Built Custom Microsoft CRM solutions for major German carmakers, production companies and local companies in Austria as well as for government agencies.

Built ASP.NET websites and services to provide administration panels for customers.

Provided consulting to customers for Microsoft CRM amendments and possibilities.

Built Custom Microsoft CRM solutions for major German carmakers, production companies and local companies in Austria as well as for government agencies.

Built ASP.NET websites and services to provide administration panels for customers.

Provided consulting to customers for Microsoft CRM amendments and possibilities.

Built, test and deliver test benches for automotive transmissions systems.

Worked intensively with customers and partner companies.

Successfully mentored a new employee to take over the development for some customers.

Built custom automation lines for major carmakers and suppliers in Austria and Germany.

Worked for many customers in-house to minimize the feedback circle time.

Planned most of the trips alone including travel and hotel for my colleagues and myself.

The company went out of business a couple of years after I left.
